alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern St. Johns County through 300 PM EDT... At 227 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sawgrass to Saint Augustine Shores. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Ponte Vedra Beach, Saint Augustine Beach, Palm Valley, Sawgrass, South Ponte Vedra, Saint Augustine Shores, Vilano Beach, Saint Augustine South and Guana River State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
